scripts.install: cd ./header && npm i && cd ../consumer && npm i && cd ../dashboard && npm i
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd header; npm run dev" "cd consumer; npm run dev" "cd dashboard; npm run dev"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd header; npm run start" "cd consumer; npm run start" "cd dashboard; npm run start"
scripts.build: cd ./header && npm run build && cd ../consumer && npm run build && cd ../dashboard && npm run build
